name: .BLOXDSCHEM File Extension
summary: Learn about .BLOXDSCHEM files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open BLOXDSCHEM files with Bloxd.io in a web browser. To open a BLOXDSCHEM file within the "Worlds" mode, type //schematic load, which pops a prompt for choosing the BLOXDSCHEM file you want to open.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
